site.heroSubtitle: Raymondo builds identities, editorial systems, and 3D forms with a tactile visual language. Each project page includes theme inspiration, design DNA, and process cues.
site.footerText:
Available for identity, visual systems, and 3D direction work.
raymondartguy@gmail.com

projects.title: Moro Studio Identity
projects.descriptionShort: Identity system balancing warmth and industrial precision.
projects.descriptionLong: A full visual identity for Moro Studio spanning print collateral, signage, and digital touchpoints. The system uses modular forms and restrained rhythm to scale across formats.
projects.themeInspiration: Inspired by offset print registration marks and old transit map geometries. The concept translates utility graphics into a more emotional visual language.
projects.styleDirection: Structured editorial rhythm with tactile contrast.
projects.typographyNotes: Grotesk primary paired with a condensed serif for callouts.
projects.motifSummary: Repeating angular frame motif to suggest movement.

assets.caption: Poster language adapted to editorial campaigns.

projects.title: Digital Sculpture Study
projects.descriptionLong: A 3D study focused on silhouette readability and soft specular breakup for stylized lighting scenes.
projects.themeInspiration: The form language references ceramic craft and arcade-era mascot geometry.
projects.styleDirection: Rounded forms, exaggerated proportions, warm key-lighting.
projects.motifSummary: Soft bevel transitions and looping contour accents.
projects.materialNotes: Stylized painted metal and matte ceramic mix

assets.caption: Poster still from the viewport setup.
